George Englehardt

  1. Foster Name: George E.
  2. Foster Family: Lewis Allen and Alta Graf
  3. Location of Family: Tecumseh, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Tecumseh, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 3
  7. Date of Birth: 1911-06-09
  8. Date of Death: 2001-11-06, Lincoln, NE
  9. Gender: male
  10. Source: National Orphan Train Complex; Mary Ellen Johnson, comp., Orphan Train Riders: Their Own Stories Vol. 4 (Baltimore: Gateway Press, 1992), p. 235-242; Tecumseh Chieftain, 17 October 1914.
